desc: Luxury one-stop baby boutique, Petit Tresor, was established in 2003 and has earned the reputation as the go-to boutique for royalty and celebrities alike. Petit Tresor is a luxury boutique selling high end baby furniture, accessories and apparel. We also specialize in making beautiful Gift Baskets to order.

layout.text:
World Renowned Luxury Baby Boutique
Gift Baskets for Every Occasion
Nursury Design by Private Appointment
